p: We also compared expression of sodium iodide symporter gene SLC5A5 in the biosamples from tumors, which were resistant to radioactive iodine therapy, with all other thyroid tumors profiled in this study. In line with the previous data [ 33, 34, 35], in our dataset SLC5A5 was statistically significantly downregulated (p = 3.44∗10 −3) in radioactive iodine-resistant tumor samples ( Figure 2).
